infoArray.name: axis
infoArray.desc: The axis on which the slider will slide.

infoArray.name: defaultValue
infoArray.desc: The default value of the slider.

infoArray.name: disableFocusRipple
infoArray.desc: Disables focus ripple if set to true.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the slider will not be interactable.

infoArray.name: max
infoArray.desc: The maximum value the slider can slide to on a scale from 0 to 1 inclusive. Cannot be equal to min.

infoArray.name: min
infoArray.desc: The minimum value the slider can slide to on a scale from 0 to 1 inclusive. Cannot be equal to max.

infoArray.name: name
infoArray.desc: The name of the slider. Behaves like the name attribute of an input element.

infoArray.name: required
infoArray.desc: Whether or not the slider is required in a form.

infoArray.name: sliderStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the inner slider element.

infoArray.name: step
infoArray.desc: The granularity the slider can step through values.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the user changes the slider's value.

infoArray.name: onDragStart
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the slider has begun to move.

infoArray.name: onDragStop
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when the slide has stopped moving.
